rows.REFERENCE FUNNEL ANATOMY — EMMA RELIEF: The exact funnel structure we are replicating for IonWave
THE EMMA RELIEF FUNNEL (Stage by Stage)

rows.col_2: Short-form video ads on Meta. Multiple creatives running simultaneously. Authority + UGC + curiosity hooks. Sorted by total impressions in ad library.
rows.col_3: Same: short-form Meta ads, multiple creatives, hook variants. Use VSL Hook Library tab for frameworks.
rows.col_5: Need creative produced, UGC creators contracted, hooks written

rows.col_2: Advertorial-style landing page. Looks like health article, not an ad. Educates on problem (gut bacteria, methane, archaea). Builds trust before asking for sale.
rows.col_3: Same: advertorial that educates on electrolyte science, hydration myths, sodium loading. Bridge between ad and VSL.
rows.col_5: Need advertorial page designed, copy written, hosted

rows.col_2: Dr. Gina Sam 30-minute VSL. Doctor-authority positioning. "7 Second Morning Ritual" hook. Problem → Failed Solutions → Mechanism → Product → Offer → Urgency. High production value.
rows.col_3: Same structure: authority figure + long-form VSL. Use VSL Script Architecture tab (12-block structure). Can be shorter (10-15 min) for electrolytes vs gut health.
rows.col_5: Need script written, authority figure identified, video produced

rows.col_2: Below VSL: full long-form sales page with ingredients, studies, testimonials, FAQ. Multi-bottle discount tiers. 90-day satisfaction guarantee. Checkout on same page.
rows.col_3: Same: sales page below VSL with ingredient breakdown, hydration science, testimonials, FAQ. Tiered pricing (1/3/6 bottles). Strong guarantee.
rows.col_5: Need page built, copy written, Shopify checkout configured

rows.col_2: Post-purchase upsell flow. Additional products (Elimipure, AKKA). One-click upsells. Increases AOV from ~$47 single bottle to ~$126 average.
rows.col_3: Same: post-purchase upsell. Bundle offers, subscription conversion, complementary products. Target AOV increase of 2-3x base price.
rows.col_5: Need upsell products/offers defined, upsell pages built

rows.col_2: Post-purchase sequences. Replenishment reminders. Cross-sell to other Konscious brands. Subscription push. Win-back flows.
rows.col_3: Same: use Lifecycle Automations tab. Post-purchase → replenishment → subscription → VIP → winback. Klaviyo.
rows.col_5: Need Klaviyo sequences built, email copy written

rows.col_2: Meta retargeting ads to site visitors, cart abandoners, past purchasers. Different creative for each stage.
rows.col_3: Same: retargeting by lifecycle stage. Use CRM Architecture + Customer Segmentation tabs for targeting logic.
rows.col_5: Need retargeting audiences built, stage-specific creative produced
